page.title: 06A Ten Year Olds Day
page.content: Hello!My name is Vanessa.This is a typical day in my life. My day begins at 7.15a.m.For breakfast I have just a cup of tea.At 8.30 I get washed put my clothes on and walk to school.I chat with my friends until the bell goes at 9.00 a.m.We do Maths. and English in the morning with a 15 minute break for playtime.I arrive home for a snack meal at 12.25 p.m.and return for 1.00 p.m.In the afternoon we do a variety of activities.My favourite is Art.Hometime is 3.15 p.m. but sometimes I stay longer if there is a club.When I get home I make my bed and do the washing-up.I go out to play marbles with my friends.At 6.15 p.m. I have tea with the family.I play outside again until 8.00 p.m.,then I watch television.At 8.30 p.m.I get ready for bed and have my supper of tea and toast.Bedtime is at 9.00 p.m.
